nodes.text: Jace Paol was a Human male Corellian who served in the Rebellion during the Galactic Civil War.

He was Bria Tharen's second-in-command of Red Hand Squadron, under the title of chief and followed Commander Tharen on her diplomatic stints, as well as participating in the capture of the Helot's Shackle and the Battle of Ylesia. He was killed, along with the rest of Red Hand Squadron on Toprawa while attempting to beam the Death Star plans to Princess Leia Organa aboard the Tantive IV.
